properties.address: Ulverston Leisure Centre, Ulverston, Cumbria LA12 9HT
properties.description: A warm, friendly space to make new friends and have a good old chat. When: Every Monday, 11am - 1.00pm (Optional gentle exercise classes at 10:30am - 11:15am & 11.30am - 12.15pm.) Where: Fitness studio at pool site. Includes: Tea, coffee, biscuits, light lunch & games. £2 pp payable by card.
properties.title: Chatter Matters

properties.description: Our libraries in Lancashire are all warm, safe and welcome spaces. You don't need to be a member of the library to visit our space. Joining the library is free if you want to be a member and borrow books, access our free book, audio, newspaper and magazine download services.
properties.title: Silverdale Library

properties.address: The Farmers Arms, Ulverston, Cumbria LA12 8DT
properties.description: Community pub in rural location with pottery and woodwork workshop attached. We will have tea and coffee available for donation, a good selection of board games, a record player and an open fire. We have a large car park in front of the premises and the pub has wheelchair access and an accessible toilet.
properties.title: The Farmers Arms Warm Space

properties.address: Ulverston Library at The Coro, Ulverston, Cumbria LA12 7LZ
properties.description: A warm and welcoming space that is free and open to all with friendly library staff to assist you. Browse a wide selection of books, use a PC, print, copy, study, join one of our groups or just relax.
properties.title: Ulverston Library

properties.description: 2pm to 4.00pm. The church building has level access, toilets and a small drinks servery. It is 0.3miles level walking from the town centre. Free hot drinks, cakes and biscuits (usually home made) served by volunteers. Newspapers, magazines, puzzle books, and board games for participants, blankets and cushions are available
properties.title: UPC Warm Space
